name: BETTER WORLD CAMPAIGN
description: Advocacy on behalf of the United Nations
sampleDescriptions: To assist the Better World Campaign in advocacy on United Nations funding, specifically UN Peacekeeping funds, and to monitor related legislative activity.
Advocate for funding of US contribution to the United Nations, particularly UN Peacekeeping.
